overview: From 2025-08-06 to 2025-08-07, ethereum-optimism/docs had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 0 active contributors.

topContributors.summary: sebastianst: Focused on a significant performance-related spike, opening PR ethereum-optimism/op-geth#655 "Calldata footprint block limit spike" to address this area.
geoknee: Focused on exploratory work related to calldata footprint cost, evidenced by an open PR in ethereum-optimism/optimism#16970, with their code changes primarily involving configuration files.
teddyknox: Focused on foundational specification work, opening PR ethereum-optimism/specs#746 to add a block calldata limit specification, and also made a small contribution to tests.
cuiweixie: Focused on internal tooling improvements, opening a PR to optimize `op-service` by using `bytes.Buffer` in ethereum-optimism/optimism#16964, reflecting a primary focus on other work.
